attributes.action: Road repairs newly done rather than patch fix the pothole with poor quality
attributes.additional_details:
Plan the phase lane to make complete new roads but first see the level of damages as most cases patch fixing been done which has lasted very short and been exposed again. Many road just Like example A312 Between white hart roundabout to Northolt station. 
As citizen I feel road tax should be waived if roads overall of London aren’t been redone fully, not patch fixing.
attributes.background: Citizens paying high value of road tax annually and Recent 2 years quality of the road has been poor and due to rain it is exposed with lots of pothole damage on not just major roads but also on Inner roads, resulting into car types damages

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road repairs are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
